scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:assets && npm run build:slides
scripts.build:slides: npm run build:intro && npm run build:oop && npm run build:naming && npm run build:document && npm run build:architecture
scripts.build:intro: slidev build slides_intro.md --out dist/intro && mv dist/intro/index.html dist/intro.html && rm -r dist/intro
scripts.build:oop: slidev build slides_oop.md --out dist/oop && mv dist/oop/index.html dist/oop.html && rm -r dist/oop
scripts.build:naming: slidev build slides_naming.md --out dist/naming && mv dist/naming/index.html dist/naming.html && rm -r dist/naming
scripts.build:document: slidev build slides_document.md --out dist/document && mv dist/document/index.html dist/document.html && rm -r dist/document
scripts.build:architecture: slidev build slides_architecture.md --out dist/architecture && mv dist/architecture/index.html dist/architecture.html && rm -r dist/architecture
